gold.user: User wants to create a new SIP authentication call credential list mapping for their Twilio account.
gold.ideal: Successfully creates a new credential list mapping with the provided details.

gold.user: User needs to retrieve all SIP authentication call credential list mappings associated with their Twilio account.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of all credential list mappings for the specified domain.

gold.user: User wants to fetch details of a specific SIP authentication call credential list mapping using its SID.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified credential list mapping.

gold.user: User intends to delete a specific SIP authentication call credential list mapping from their Twilio account.
gold.ideal: Successfully deletes the specified credential list mapping.
